subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
  Description : I asked if spirit was still there and the answer sounds like a No. ????

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/Is%20spirit%20still%20there.wav
